::Perndabot::

Perndabot clenches his teeth at Biomass's comment, watching the bot 
approach untill his chest was pressed against the muzzle of 
Perndabot's missile launcher, which was a pretty stupid move in 
Perndabot's opinion. He growls, bearing his pirhana teeth at Biomass 
at the second comment.

"We'll see how insultive you are in the pit," he growls as he pulls 
the trigger of the missile launcher. Both missiles launch at the same 
time, straight into Biomass's chest. They were both set to explode on 
impact.






--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> 
> 
> * Biomass continued towards the IF, seeing with his scanners that 
his strike 
> had had a very pleasing effect on Perndabot and his balence.
> Little did he know but it was his adranalin rising that was making 
this as 
> pleasing as it was, liking to test his power against a bigger foe 
like this.
> But he stops when he hears the click of a fully loaded missil 
launched aimed 
> at the back of his skull, chuckling to himself as he looks over his 
shoulder 
> at Perndabot.*
> 
> " Sensative about your sex, hmm?"
> 
> * Biomass turns around so that he was looking along the line of his 
shoulder 
> towards Perndabot, a smile on his face but one that was more wicked 
then 
> happy.
> Without hesitation he walks back towards Perndabot, moving so that 
the end 
> of the missil launched was pressed up against his chest-plate. His 
nose 
> inches awat from Perndabots.*
> 
> " I thought you women were proud to be what you are?"
> 
> * Nue'e glared at both of them, stepping back and rolling her eyes 
while 
> pushing her glasses up.
> This was stupid.*
>
